name: Kartofank VR
description: Built from ground up for VR and room-scale! Immerse yourself in the potato-love environment. Feed your family and those of your country-men!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 8 Processor: I5 6600 or higher Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX980 Storage: 350 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: I7 6700 or higher Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX1080 Storage: 350 MB available space
